long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Are you a Developer? backend? frontend? full-stack? product manager ?
- Is your company have multi environments to work on (development, staging, production, ..)?
- Are you the one who doesn't close any tab in your browser?
- Are you the one who doesn't give any attention to browsers' URLs?

if you are all above I'm here with this simple extension to save your life from a situation that can make you test or reproduce a bug on production by mistake

just install extension go to your production link mark it as production and you are good to go  üöÄ
